description: Our sailor boy is dressed and ready to head home. He's learned a lot more about himself then he ever expected and I think he's ready to start experimenting on his own. Damn he looks good in those dress whites. Before he can get out though, Dink has one more request. One more final show.Reluctantly, Teddy agrees. I think he's really starting to get off the exhibitionist side of all this. Teddy slides out of his uniform and delivers a very hot solo session. His slender body is in top form as he pounds out one last load of cream. Teddy has a whole new life ahead of him and I think he's ready for it.
title: Teddy
